did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Correspondence of Audrey Moore - Board of Supervisors Chairperson, 1988-1991
did.physloc: State Records Center - Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of collection is open to patrons; however, a few items are sealed due to privacy restrictions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Correspondence of Audrey Moore - Board of Supervisors Chairperson, 1988-1991. Local government records collection, Fairfax County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Fairfax County under the accession number 42347.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Audrey Moore was a member of the Fairfax County (Va.) Board of Supervisors as a representative of the Annandale district from 1972 to 1988. She served as chairperson of the Fairfax County (Va.) Board of Supervisors from 1988 to 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Correspondence of Audrey Moore - Board of Supervisors Chairperson, 1988-1991, includes correspondence received by Audrey Moore during her tenure as chairperson of the Fairfax County (Va.) Board of Supervisors. The collection also includes records other than correspondence such as recordings of Board of Supervisors meetings, newspaper clippings, brochures, maps, photographs, press releases, campaign materials, etc. A portion of this collection was processed using minimal processing standards.
